creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: shape is like the letter "T"; section that goes around waist has embroidered pattern in various colors (pattern looks like feathers); section that hangs down the center of the belt has a simplified pattern; tassel at the end has variety of vibrant colors--predominately red and pink; belt part has metal clasp
title: Belt
